useCase.name: Update Receptionist Information

preconditions.precondition: Admin is logged in and has permission to update receptionist information.

useCase.trigger: User requests to update receptionist information.

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to update receptionist information.
UI displays the update form for the receptionist.
Admin fills in the updated receptionist details and submits.
UI sends the updated data to the system.
System updates the receptionist information in the database.
System confirms successful update to Admin.
